text:
When I add the break-after="page" or break-before="page" attribute to the the
fo:block tags the renderer runs forever at ~99% CPU usage.

I need to be able to prevent table cells from being broken at page breaks and
the break-*='page' looks like the only way to do it.

Using the SUN JRE 1.4.
creator: ohickman@mdi.cc
